entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [DAC][DBI] ICorDebugModule::GetMetaDataInterface fails in net6.0 for "Anonymously Hosted DynamicMethods Assembly" in unit test project. #62977
  • Performance optimization suggestion for Enum.Value.ToString() #62976
  • Creating symbolic links without developer mode or elevation fails silently #62975
    7.0.0
  • Debugging a self-contained app locks its mscordbi.dll #62974
  • Should there be more volatile in ConcurrentDictionary? #62972
  • Consider augmenting regex tests with "polyglot regex corpus" #62971
  • .NET 6 Managed `ThreadPool` / `Thread` performance and reliability degradations #62967
    6.0.x
  • [wasm][NodeJs] System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 test failed #62965
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] debuger test failures on CI #62964
    7.0.0
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.21.56803 is missing from symbol servers. #62962
  • Fix incorrect assert for cgroup file system type #62960
  • JsonIgnore in record declaration #62961
  • LoggerMessage not serializing type #62957
  • Support equivalent of AssemblyBuilder.Save to save in-memory IL to an assembly #62956
    7.0.0
  • Runtime libraries: debug symbols missing for latest patches (5.0.13, 6.0.1) #62955
  • [question] bcl between different instruction package like Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x64 and Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x86 #62953
  • The response ended prematurely #62963
  • [API Proposal]: Make `Lookup<TKey,TElement>` publicly constructable #62949
  • [Uri] LocalPath shouldn't encode unicode chars #62946
  • RuntimeHandles should implement IEquatable #62944
  • Support file named 'NUL' #62943
  • The mscordbi.dll .NET 5.0.13 is missing from symbol servers. #62939
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937

Closed

  • Style: should be System.Random(Int32 seed) rather than System.Random(Int32 Seed) #62969
  • JIT does not recognize Vector<T>.Count and Vector{128|256}.Count is unsigned in div / mod #62326
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'child->isContained()' #60330
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4.cmd #61579
    7.0.0
  • Error unzipping file with GZipStream #62954
  • NativeAOT smoke tests failed #62950
  • typo in autogenerated cs file #62909
  • How to identify ICU is used in .net 6 and later... #62930
    Future
  • NativeAOT missing src/tests/issues.targets changes. #62907
  • Spurious Newlines Added to Log Output #61763
  • .Net 6 `System.Random` returns only 0 after a while when initialised with a seed #61789

PullRequests

Created

  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62973
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [tests] Cleanup copy/pasted assembly update test projects #62970
    area-Infrastructure
  • Suppress OSR for crossgen2 execution #62968
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle RunClassConstructor with nonreflectable cctor #62947
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow building libs against NativeAOT CoreLib #62945
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-vs4mac] Set stabilize package version to false #62941
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add RID for Alpine 3.15 #62938
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update shared trimming attributes with recently added/used types #62911
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework
  • Unify implementation of string constructors accross runtimes #62936
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage tests #62867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove forward-sub for hw intrinsics during inlining #62883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #62790
  • RPM package needs to create host symlink #62925
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 6.0.x
  • OSR support for Arm64 #62831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • setInternalRegsDelayFree only for candidate lclVars #62884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    area-System.Security
  • Remove an unused .editorconfig entry. #62905
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • corerun: silently ignore directories when building TPA #62932
    area-Host
  • Handle zero-sized unwind fragment candidates #62931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Corrected the typo in autogenerated cs file. #62934
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Increase iteration count in the FinalizeTest #62924
    area-System.Threading
  • Add Pri-0 test suppressions for NativeAOT #62926
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x

Updated

  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Move coreclr specific ComponentActivator hosting dependency to coreclr #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono
  • Implement the "moffset" encoding size optimization in `emitOutputAM` #62896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1519084 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal and libunwind directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues in PAL #62625
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Have NativeAOT test execution project include SDK #62927
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add tests to cover `dotnet tool list` #23110
    Backlog
  • Appsettings environments don group in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Worker #23106
  • Provide docs on how to integrate custom msbuild target with dotnet watch and hot reload #23103
  • Can't debug dotnet pack code from VS #23101

Closed

  • Code using INumber<T> and preview features does not compile with .NET 6.0.101 SDK #23073

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1517871 #23100
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1517744 #23098
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1517666 #23096
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #23057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet tool list command #23097
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #23060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add FadingOption to disable all code fading. #58400
  • Remove or migrate file based logging for IDE diagnostic analyzer service #58394
    Backlog
  • Unexpected nullability warning for a deconstruction assignment #58393
  • Preprocessor Directives in .csproj files get rejected when they contain line breaks or white space. #58391

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException from FindReferencesProgressAdapter.OnReferenceFoundAsync #58305
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Possible change to remove fading entirely from previews #58401
    Area-IDE
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Error Bug #58398
    Area-IDE
  • Move component model code to common location for all AbstractPackages #58397
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1518948 #58384
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Acquire component model with standard pattern #58395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix TS lightbulb regression #58392
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #58385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update hosted VS 2017 usage to 2019 #58353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1505882 #58239
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.7-vs-deps to release/dev16.9-vs-deps #58373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58383
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58402
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to a prepared statement to avoid unintentional sql injection. #58359
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1517172 #58374
    auto-merge
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM application Hangs on MSAL Authentication. #39104
  • Perf regression: single_query #39103
  • `invokeMethodAsync` 5x slower in Firefox compared to Edge or Chrome #39102
  • Make AspNetCoreModuleV2 distributable locally with the application rather than installable globally #39099
  • [.NET 6.0 Blazor server] same sessionId for two browser connected on same Machine #39096
  • Potential regression in injection of IHttpContextAccessor in SignalR Hub.OnConnectedAsync #39095
  • Error unprotecting the session cookie. #39091
  • dotnet process stays running after stopping debug. #39090
  • Blazor WASM, ongoing timers cause a global exception when browser loses focus for some time #39089

Closed

  • Issues running .net 5 / 6 console app on VS2022 #38913
  • Is there a way to add metadata to all GET endpoints in ASP.NET Core? #39081
  • Blazor WASM publishing error. Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. TypeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Import #0 module="a" error: module is not an object or function blazor webassembly After update to .net 6.0.1 and Visual Studio 2022 17.0.4 #39092
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #39077
  • Blazor cannot serialize number to string #39080
  • [Question] A way to completely disable authentication on a method #39019
    Discussions
  • Potential regression in IHttpContextAccessor injection #39094
  • Potential regression in IHttpContextAccessor injection #39093
  • ModelState validation result should be consistent between `BadRequestObjectResult` and `ApiControllerAttribute` #38504
  • UserManager.FindByIdAsync fails when the user is an IdentityUser<int> #39083

PullRequests

Created

  • Add status code alias with enum as parameter #39097
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets for release/5.0 #39044
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.14
  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets for release/3.1 #39046
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.23

Updated

  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • Adding EntryAssembly to RazorPagesOptions #39085
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39035
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Update branding to 2.1.32 & merge internal commits #39029
    2.1.x
  • Reimplement the concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #39040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Identity stores tests fixes #39088
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Move to OSX.1015.Amd64.Open #39049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `be7a372` to `e2c62a7` #38755
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, Mac] Pan gesture not working while using clip #3800
  • Couldn't SideLoad the MAUI Windows Application #3799

Closed

  • Essentials GetMainDisplayInfo uses unsupported API (and throws exception) #3722
  • TapGestureRecognizer doesn't call Tap handler when used in a DataTemplate #3796

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable `InternalsVisibleTo` for `CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core` #3798

Merged

  • [android] compute HasRtlSupport once on startup #3801
  • Merge 6.0.100-preview11 to main #3750
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Updated the Stepper sample in the Gallery #3775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Essentials fix DeviceDisplay and DeviceInfo #3738
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Window extend toolbar #3693
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [android] stop using Build.VERSION.SdkInt #3783
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • WinUI Flyout Handler #3735
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲
  • Added Shell Page dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.12
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: flaky test - ToListAsync_with_canceled_token #27033
  • Migrations creates shadow key on entities with primary and foreign key relationship of the same name when it is not needed #27032
  • Translate methods in Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Linq namespaces #27030
  • Website cannot load Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore #27029

Closed

  • WithMany documentation incorrectly talks about reference navigations #26983
    7.0.0
  • [Cosmos] How and where discriminator functionality is implemented? #26980
  • db.EnsureCreated() doesn't seem to create views #26965
  • Query issue after migrating from EF 2.2 to EF6 #26955
  • A DbContext instance cannot be used inside OnConfiguring since it is still being configured at this point #26920
  • Does Compiled models work when using Lazy loading without proxies? #26917
  • Generic Repository & Unit Of Work For Multiple Database #26898

PullRequests

Created

  • Use conventions and model snapshot in the migration tests #27031

Merged

  • WithMany doc: fix the sample expression #27003
    community-contribution

Updated

  • No test left behind: Ef6GroupByTest #26974
  • Static analysis: protect against mutating fields in hash calculations #27025
  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935
